Hi gang,
 
I was wondering how the size of a tsuba affects it's value. All things
being equal, would a 2.8 inch diam tsuba be worth less than say an
identical 3.5 inch one ? Or even a 4 inch one ?
 
also when is a tsuba considered to be of wakizashi or katana size ? and
would that affect the price as well ?
 
thanks for listening !
 
 
- Matt
